Reference

All functions

FormatTrack()

Prepare Input for Creating Coverage Plot.

GetConsensusPeak()

Get Consensus Peak from Replicates with MSPC.

GetPlotData()

Plot Object Generated by ggcoverage.

LoadTrackFile()

Load Track File to Dataframe.

geom_base()

Add Base and Amino Acid Annotation to Coverage Plot.

geom_cnv()

Add CNV Annotation to Coverage Plot.

geom_coverage()

Layer for Coverage Plot.

geom_feature()

Add Feature Annotation to Coverage Plot.

geom_gc()

Add GC Content Annotation to Coverage Plot.

geom_gene()

Add Gene Annotation to Coverage Plot.

geom_ideogram()

Add Ideogram Annotation to Coverage Plot.

geom_link()

Add Links to Coverage Plot.

geom_peak()

Add Peak Annotation to Coverage Plot.

geom_protein()

Layer for Protein Coverage Plot.

geom_tad()

Add Contact Map to Coverage Plot.

geom_tad2()

Add Contact Map to Coverage Plot.

geom_transcript()

Add Transcript Annotation to Coverage Plot.

ggcoverage()

Create Coverage Plot.

ggprotein()

Create Mass Spectrometry Protein Coverage Plot.

theme_aa()

Theme for geom_base with Amino Acid.

theme_base()

Theme for geom_base.

theme_base2()

Theme for geom_base without margin.

theme_cnv()

Theme for geom_cnv.

theme_coverage()

Theme for geom_coverage.

theme_coverage2()

Theme for geom_coverage.

theme_feature()

Theme for geom_feature.

theme_gc()

Theme for geom_gc.

theme_gene()

Theme for geom_gene.

theme_ideogram()

Theme for geom_ideogram.

theme_link()

Theme for geom_link.

theme_peak()

Theme for geom_peak.

theme_protein()

Theme for geom_protein.

theme_protein2()

Theme for geom_protein.

theme_tad()

Theme for geom_tad.

theme_tad2()
